snippet: The president, who has had very few medical problems during his nearly six years in office, appeared to have symptoms of acid reflux, officials said.
abstract: Pres Obama is found to have symptoms indicating acid reflux after complaining of sore throat.
lead_paragraph: The president, who has had very few medical problems during his nearly six years in office, appeared to have symptoms of acid reflux, officials said.

headline.main: Obama Is Found to Have Symptoms of Acid Reflux
headline.print_headline: Obama is Found to Have Symptoms of Acid Reflux
